snippet: A man got out of his pickup, walked up to the defendant in a drug-dealing case and fatally shot him in the chest, then set down his gun and surrendered as deputies confronted him outside the Madison County Courthouse Monday morning.
abstract: William B Wells shoots and kills Kendrick Armond Brown, defendant in a drug-dealing case, outside Mississippi courthouse then surrenders to authorities; motive for killing is unknown.
lead_paragraph: A man got out of his pickup, walked up to the defendant in a drug-dealing case and fatally shot him in the chest, then set down his gun and surrendered as deputies confronted him outside the Madison County Courthouse Monday morning.

headline.main: Mississippi: Defendant Shot to Death Outside Court
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Defendant Shot to Death Outside Court
